description:
Burner is your “other” number – your work number, Craigslist number, Etsy number or dating number – the one to give out when you need to be in touch, but don’t want to stay connected forever.

Named a TIME Magazine Top 50 App of 2013 and featured in the New York Times, Wired, Engadget, BoingBoing, Lifehacker, and more.

Use Burner for everyday situations – web forms, deliveries, salespeople, and buying things on the web – just like any other phone number.  Get all the features you need to stay in touch including calls, texts, and picture messages. Create multiple Burners, keep them as long as you want, and burn them anytime – no hassles and no contracts. 

Share your Burner with anyone and everyone – and keep your real number private. 

What our users are saying:

"It’s so simple to use for texts and calls. You won’t be disappointed!"

"Best all time app…hands down."

"You guys this app is amazing! Perfect and original, especially if you don't want strangers to have your real number. A+++++"

IMPORTANT: Not for iPad or iPod Touch. Phone calls use cell phone minutes. Burners are free for a trial period only -- please review our pricing before purchasing. Area code availability varies. May not work with SMS shortcode services. Not for 911 emergency services. Works in US and Canada only. Not available in Puerto Rico.

 For more information see Privacy Policy (http://burnerapp.com/privacy) and Terms of Use (http://burnerapp.com/terms-of-service).
trackCensoredName: Burner – Free Phone Number for Private Texts, Calls, and Pictures
trackName: Burner – Free Phone Number for Private Texts, Calls, and Pictures
releaseNotes:
We’ve redesigned Burner from top to bottom and added MMS picture messaging, along with great new productivity and iOS 8 features.

Burner now includes:
- a whole new look, feel, and color scheme
- unified inbox for faster and more intuitive communications
- dedicated contact management for each Burner 
- “Today” view extension – look up and use Burners with a swipe from anywhere
- privacy lock with TouchID and PIN to keep your communications secure
- faster and more reliable than ever before
- more minutes and SMS messages for the same price!

Most importantly – MMS-enabled phone numbers for sending and receiving pictures.

Thanks for all your support.  We hope you love the new Burner!
